document_data.refs1e: The 1st edition statistics for the phororhacos were used instead of the axe beak, since the Dragon article proposes it as a better approximation due to its height.
document_data.mainbody:
The diatryma () was an ancient large, flightless bird native to the Underdark.
The gigantic bird was about  tall.
The drow used their hugely plumed feathers for decoration. known as a feather of diatryma summoning. By blowing into the feather, Jarlaxle was able to summon a diatryma bird.
